section.p: For Type-4 board, it is recommended that memory signals (DQ/ CLK/ DQS/ WCK/ CA) are fully routed in inner layers. For Type-3 board, it is recommended that main route of memory signals is routed as stripline; with minimum microstrip breakout and break-in length allowed, as shown in table below. An isolation ground guard ring is recommended on the surface layer between memory power plane and memory breakout signal routing.
